targets.rawSql:
SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
                    		inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
                    		inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
										   	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
										   	and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
    inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
    inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4) 
		and b.principal is true
		and a.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback > 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
										   	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1)
										   	and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1)
		and b.principal is true
		and a.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
										   	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2)
										   	and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2)
		and b.principal is true
		and a.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback > 2  or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
												inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
												inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
										   	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4)
										   	and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
		inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
		inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4)
		and b.principal is true
		and a.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

select b.nombre::Text "ESTADOS",
trunc(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
		  THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal,2) AS "MINISTERIOS Y ENTES",
trunc(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
		  THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal,2) AS "GOBERNACIONES",
trunc(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
		  THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal,2) AS "ALCALDIAS",
trunc(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
		  THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/count(*)::decimal,2) AS "TOTAL"
from gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = A.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia p on p.id = a.id_parroquia
inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.resolutorio z on z.id =  e.id_resolutorio
where  a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)
and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4) and b.id < 25 
and e.principal is true
group by b.nombre
HAVING count(*) >= 2
order by "TOTAL" desc

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
												inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
	                      inner join psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional bb on bb.estado = e.nombre
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
										   	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4) and bb.corredor = 'SI'
										   	and b.principal is true and d.active = 1
												  and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
		inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
	  inner join psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional bb on bb.estado = e.nombre
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4) and bb.corredor = 'SI'
		and b.principal is true
		and d.active = 1
		and d.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
	                      inner join psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional bb on bb.estado = e.nombre
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
										   	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4) and bb.corredor = 'SI'
										   	and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
	  inner join psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional bb on bb.estado = e.nombre
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4) and bb.corredor = 'SI'
		and b.principal is true
		and a.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
												inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
	                      inner join psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional bb on bb.estado = e.nombre
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
										   	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2) and bb.corredor = 'SI'
										   	and b.principal is true and d.active = 1
												and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
		inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
	  inner join psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional bb on bb.estado = e.nombre
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2) and bb.corredor = 'SI'
		and b.principal is true
		and d.active = 1
		and d.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
												inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
												inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
												inner join gestion.parroquia p on p.id = a.id_parroquia	
	                     	inner join psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional bb on bb.estado = e.nombre
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
										   	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4) and bb.corredor = 'SI'
										   	and b.principal is true and d.active = 1
												and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
		inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
	  inner join psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional bb on bb.estado = e.nombre
	  inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
		inner join gestion.parroquia p on p.id = a.id_parroquia	
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4) and bb.corredor = 'SI'
		and b.principal is true
		and d.active = 1
		and d.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

select b.nombre::Text "ESTADOS",
trunc(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
		  THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal,2) AS "MINISTERIOS Y ENTES",
trunc(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
		  THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal,2) AS "GOBERNACIONES",
trunc(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
		  THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal,2) AS "ALCALDIAS",
trunc(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
		  THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/count(*)::decimal,2) AS "TOTAL"
from gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia p on p.id = a.id_parroquia
inner join psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional bb on bb.estado = b.nombre
inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.resolutorio z on z.id =  e.id_resolutorio
where a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)
and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4) and b.id < 25 
and bb.corredor = 'SI'
and e.principal is true
group by  b.nombre
HAVING count(*) > 1
order by "TOTAL" desc

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
	                      inner join psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional bb on bb.estado = e.nombre
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
										   	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4) and bb.corredor = 'NO'
										   	and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
	  inner join psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional bb on bb.estado = e.nombre
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4) and bb.corredor = 'NO'
		and b.principal is true
		and a.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
												inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
	                      inner join psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional bb on bb.estado = e.nombre
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
										   	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2) and bb.corredor = 'NO'
										   	and b.principal is true and d.active = 1
												and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
		inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
	  inner join psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional bb on bb.estado = e.nombre
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2) and bb.corredor = 'NO'
		and b.principal is true
		and d.active = 1
		and d.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
												inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
	                     	inner join psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional bb on bb.estado = e.nombre
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
										   	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4) and bb.corredor = 'NO'
										   	and b.principal is true and d.active = 1
												and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
		inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
	  inner join psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional bb on bb.estado = e.nombre
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4) and bb.corredor = 'NO'
		and b.principal is true
		and d.active = 1
		and d.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')
